page.title: 07PRIMARY SCHOOLS OF ARMTHORPE
page.content: Tranmoor Junior and C of E Infants are two primary schools of Armthorpe. {NUMBERS OF PUPILS:}In both schools we found the numbers had decreased because of new schools and fewer births.Therefore,they have had to cut down on teachers. {FINANCE:}The junior school with 168 pupils didn't get enough money for all the books and equipment needed,though the infant school with only 36 pupils had plenty of funds.It has used the extra money for trips.The junior school doesn't have many trips because of shortage of money and staff. {CURRICULUM:}In the 1st year of the infants the children played many games and learned to read and write.Later they'd learn to do simple sums.In the early years of the junior school they would concentrate mostly on Maths. and English.
